recipes.name: Butter Chicken
ingredients: 2 lbs boneless chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces
recipes.method: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, garam masala, and red chili powder. Melt butter in a pan and add tomato puree. Add marinated chicken and cook until done. Add cream and salt to taste. Garnish with cilantro leaves and serve hot.

recipes.name: Palak Paneer
recipes.method: Blanch spinach and puree. Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds. Add chopped onion and cook until brown. Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for another minute. Add coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Add spinach puree and cook for a few minutes. Add cubed paneer and cook for a few more minutes. Serve hot with rice or naan.

recipes.name: Gulab Jamun
recipes.method: Mix milk powder, all-purpose flour, and baking powder. Add ghee and mix well. Add milk and make a smooth dough. Heat oil in a pan. Shape dough into small balls and fry until golden brown. In another pan, heat sugar, water, and cardamom powder to make syrup. Add fried balls to syrup and soak for a few minutes. Serve hot or cold.
